headline: CoreWeave, BigBear.ai & SMX, Vistra: Trending Tickers
summary: Market Domination host Myles Udland and Yahoo Finance senior reporter Brooke DiPalma track several of the day's top trending stock tickers, including CoreWeave shares (CRWV) receiving upgrades from two Wall Street firms, BigBear.ai's (BBAI) AI partnership with SMX (Security Matters) (SMX), and Vistra (VST) getting a downgrade from Jefferies analysts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

headline: AI Stocks Are Dragging on the Market in Reversal of Yesterday's Rally
summary: Wall Street just played a reverse card on the artificial intelligence rally.  A day after AI stocks and Apple boosted the S&P 500 to fresh highs despite bad market breadth, it was the very same stocks that were dragging on the index.  The S&P 500 was down 0.1%, while the Nasdaq Composite was off 0.3%.
